gen:link.msg:message: Gerapporteerde waarde van `AmountAcquisitionCosts` aan het einde van de periode BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de gerapporteerde waarde van `AmountAcquisitionCosts` aan het begin van de periode en de mutaties gedurende de periode, `MutationReportingYearAcquisitionCosts`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_AmountAcquisitionCostsEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_AmountAcquisitionCostsEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_AmountAcquisitionCostsStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_AmountAcquisitionCostsStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_MutationReportingYearAcquisitionCosts')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_MutationReportingYearAcquisitionCosts return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`InsuranceInCashMember` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende domeinleden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract4_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract4_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract4_Abstract_ChildrenMember')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract4_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`MutationReportingYearAcquisitionCosts` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_MutationReportingYearAcquisitionCosts')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_MutationReportingYearAcquisitionCosts return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfMutationReportingYearAcquisitionCostsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfMutationReportingYearAcquisitionCostsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfMutationReportingYearAcquisitionCostsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfMutationReportingYearAcquisitionCostsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
